select grp_datacollecttype_prv.datacollecttype_prv_id, grp_datacollecttype_prv.datacollecttype_prv_filename, grp_datacollecttype_prv.datacollecttype_prv_filepath, grp_datacollecttype.datacollecttemp_type, grp_datacollecttype.datacollecttemp_filepath, grp_datacollecttype.datacollecttemp_filename from grp_datacollecttype_prv, grp_datacollecttype where grp_datacollecttype_prv.datacollecttype_id = grp_datacollecttype.datacollecttype_id and grp_datacollecttype_prv.datacollect_prv_id = #{datacollectPrvId}
